amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 as en bloc: Nos. 1, 3, 4, 5, 7, 9, 12, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 20, 21, 22, 30, 31, 32, 33, 34, 35, 36, and 37.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Joyce (OH) amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Joyce (OH).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Joyce (OH) amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Joyce (OH) amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
